title: Brownstone Sans PDF Specimen
content:
**[BROWNSTONE SANS PDF SPECIMEN](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014143536/http:/www.sudtipos.com/downloads/Brownstone-Specimen.pdf)**.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014143536im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Brownstone-Specimen-typhop_3948.jpg)

A few days ago we were very happy to announce the release of **[Brownstone Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014143536/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=UMT0000598)** typeface.

Now we are happy to introduce the **[Brownstone PDF Specimen](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014143536/http:/www.sudtipos.com/downloads/Brownstone-Specimen.pdf)**. Usually we like to invite young illustrators, photographers, typographers to collaborate on some material to preview the new designs. (e.g. [Business Penmanship PDF](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014143536/http:/www.veer.com/download/pdf/businesspenmanship_specimen.pdf))

The Brownstone Sans is a very special specimen for us because it was written and photographed by Jon Parker, a good and personal friend who actually lives on Brooklyn.

**[Visit Sudtipos](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014143536/http:/www.sudtipos.com/)**.
author: Ale Paul
